content:
Certainly, I apologize for the oversight in my previous response. Here's a revised 10-week training plan that will take you from Monday, February 20, 2023, until race day, April 17, 2023. The weekly mileage totals include your current 60 miles per week:

Week 1: February 20-26
Monday: Rest
Tuesday: 8 miles with the last 2 at marathon pace
Wednesday: 10 miles easy
Thursday: 10 miles with 6 at tempo pace
Friday: 6 miles easy
Saturday: 12 miles with last 3 at marathon pace
Sunday: 14 miles easy
Total mileage: 60 miles

Week 2: February 27 - March 5
Monday: Rest
Tuesday: 9 miles with the last 2 at marathon pace
Wednesday: 10 miles easy
Thursday: 12 miles with 7 at tempo pace
Friday: 6 miles easy
Saturday: 14 miles with last 4 at marathon pace
Sunday: 15 miles easy
Total mileage: 66 miles

Week 3: March 6-12
Monday: Rest
Tuesday: 10 miles with the last 2 at marathon pace
Wednesday: 11 miles easy
Thursday: 14 miles with 8 at tempo pace
Friday: 6 miles easy
Saturday: 16 miles with last 5 at marathon pace
Sunday: 17 miles easy
Total mileage: 72 miles

Week 4: March 13-19
Monday: Rest
Tuesday: 11 miles with the last 3 at marathon pace
Wednesday: 12 miles easy
Thursday: 16 miles with 9 at tempo pace
Friday: 7 miles easy
Saturday: 18 miles with last 6 at marathon pace
Sunday: 19 miles easy
Total mileage: 73 miles

Week 5: March 20-26
Monday: Rest
Tuesday: 12 miles with the last 3 at marathon pace
Wednesday: 12 miles easy
Thursday: 18 miles with 10 at tempo pace
Friday: 7 miles easy
Saturday: 20 miles with last 7 at marathon pace
Sunday: 20 miles easy
Total mileage: 79 miles

Week 6: March 27 - April 2
Monday: Rest
Tuesday: 13 miles with the last 3 at marathon pace
Wednesday: 12 miles easy
Thursday: 20 miles with 12 at tempo pace
Friday: 7 miles easy
Saturday: 22 miles with last 8 at marathon pace
Sunday: 22 miles easy
Total mileage: 86 miles

Week 7: April 3-9
Monday: Rest
Tuesday: 14 miles with the last 3 at marathon pace
Wednesday: 12 miles easy
Thursday: 22 miles with 13 at tempo pace
Friday: 7 miles easy
Saturday: 24 miles with last 9 at marathon pace
Sunday: 24 miles easy
Total mileage: 92 miles

Week 8: April 10-16
Monday: Rest
Tuesday: 12 miles with the last 4 at marathon pace
Wednesday: 10 miles easy
Thursday: 10 miles with 6 at tempo pace
Friday: 6 miles easy
Saturday: 8 miles with last 3 at marathon pace
Sunday: 6 miles easy
Total mileage: 52 miles

Week 9: April 17 - Race Day!
Monday: Rest
Tuesday: 4 miles easy
Wednesday: 6 miles with last 2 at marathon pace
Thursday: 4 miles easy
Friday: 3 miles easy
Saturday: Rest
Sunday
